page.title: 07SMALL BUSINESS IN LAMBLEY
page.content: On this page we will be looking at a second example of a small business {Floralands Garden Centre}in Lambley. One Thursday afternoon 20/6/85 we went to Lambley.We went to ask for the manager,and a woman went to get him.The manager said go out side to the restaurant so we did .The manager went to get us a drink of orange.We asked the manager some questions.We asked the manager if it was a family business and it was.There were lots of green houses and plastic garden ponds. In 1880 there was a nursery,in 1880 they wouldnt know what a garden centre was.Floralands is open all year round apart from Christmas day and Boxing day.
